title: Agriculture in Canada
summary_short: Canada’s agriculture and agri-food system is a major economic driver and a global exporter.
intro_short: From Prairie grains to horticulture and livestock, Canadian agriculture spans climates & supply chains and is modernizing rapidly.
impact: Precision agriculture, improved rotations, manure & nutrient management raise yields, lower emissions, and improve margins.

title: Agriculture across the World
summary_short: Global agriculture must feed a growing population amid climate and resource constraints.
intro_short: Production patterns vary by region; technology and sustainable practices are reshaping productivity and resilience.
impact: Climate-smart practices (soil health, water stewardship, rotations) reduce risk while protecting ecosystems.

title: Problems Agriculture Is Facing Globally
summary_short: Risks: climate volatility, water stress, soil decline, pests/diseases, labour shortages, market shocks.
intro_short: These pressures can reduce yields, raise costs, and threaten food security—especially for smallholders.
impact: Diversification, early-warning systems, and resilient supply chains mitigate shocks and protect livelihoods.

title: The Future of Agriculture
summary_short: Data-driven, climate-smart, regenerative systems define the future of farming.
intro_short: Precision inputs, improved genetics, protected cultivation, and digital platforms will transform productivity.
impact: Higher yields with lower emissions and better profitability while preserving natural resources.

title: Industrial Electrification
summary_short: Switching heat and processes from fossil fuels to electricity cuts emissions in industry.
intro_short: Electrified boilers, heat pumps, and induction improve efficiency and enable clean power usage.
impact: Decarbonizes heavy industry when paired with renewables; reduces air pollution and O&M costs.

title: Transport Industry Transition
summary_short: EVs, fuel cells, and sustainable fuels are reshaping mobility across road, air, and marine.
intro_short: Charging networks, hydrogen refueling, and lightweighting enable cleaner logistics and travel.
impact: Lower lifecycle emissions, quieter cities, and reduced fuel costs with proper infrastructure roll-out.
